title: Best Android Apps April 2017 [Ep#9] #CoolNewApps
description:
So, welcome to the 9th episode of #CoolNewApps. I didn't release, we are close to 1 year now. Awesome :)

Apps links

1. Walls for Reddit (Unreleased)
https://goo.gl/sxEJZo

2. Real Notepad: Notebook
https://goo.gl/W9Qs4A

3. Privacy Screen Guard
https://goo.gl/qIqy77

4. Sync for facebook - https://www.dropbox.com/s/jx5mzazsxsnuelh/app-release.apk

5. Pocket Sense
 https://goo.gl/MMfd3C

[Apps that didn't make the list, but still worth checking out]


1. GIF Share Overlay - https://goo.gl/zMkYZr

Provides an overlay that draws on top of other apps and lets you quickly search and share GIFs without leaving your favorite app

2. Volume Key Cursor Control - https://goo.gl/TRmXZ7
Control your cursor with volume keys. I didn't include this, since gboard already does this by sliding over spacebar key. 

3. 1CHAT (notify) - can't find the download link now. 
A simple Facebook messenger chat head for Whatsapp.

4. Comic blitz - https://goo.gl/uDJ5AE
Comic reading of all your favorite action.

5. Bard - Video Assembler - https://goo.gl/nFr9o8
Make your favorite actors or Youtube celebrities. The concept is good but the videos are limited.

6.InstaSwipe Instagram Panorama - https://goo.gl/jACDGy
Display your gorgeous panoramic images on Instagram but had to sacrifice the resolution to fit Instagram's size restrictions?

---------

(I didn't miss it this time :p)

What video editor do I use?

iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
